podcast.title: Test Pattern
podcast.subtitle: Pre- and post-shows, deleted material, special announcements, and a testing ground for shows on ESN.fm
podcast.description: Pre- and post-shows, deleted material, special announcements, and a testing ground for shows on ESN.fm
podcast.summary: Pre- and post-shows, deleted material, special announcements, and a testing ground for shows on ESN.fm
podcast.author: esn_fm

body.query:
query podcast($id: String!) {
  podcast(id: $id) {
    id: _id
    title
    subtitle
    feedUrl
    description
    summary
    author
    link
    language
    image {
      poster
      __typename
    }
    category
    subcategory
    createdDate
    __typename
  }
}
